name: HOMESTEAD INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner v. PENJERDEL REFRIGERATION COMPANY and Episcopal Hospital, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Homestead Insurance v. Penjerdel Refrigeration Co.

parties: HOMESTEAD INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner v. PENJERDEL REFRIGERATION COMPANY and Episcopal Hospital, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of April 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. It is further ordered that this matter be consolidated with State Farm Fire and Casualty Co. v. Craley, No. 28 MAP 2002 and Motorists Mutual Insurance Co. v. Pinkerton et al, No. 20 WAP 2002.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
795 A.2d 376
HOMESTEAD INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner v. PENJERDEL REFRIGERATION COMPANY and Episcopal Hospital, Respondent.
No. 996 MAL 2001.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 23, 2002.
